text: György (George) Konrád (2 April 1933 – 13 September 2019) was a Hungarian novelist and essayist. He was known as a supporter of individual freedom. He was born in Berettyóújfalu, Hungary. He was President of PEN International from 1990 through 1993. Konrád died on 13 September 2019 in Budapest at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Homepage * Biography Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hungarian novelists Category:Essayists
title: György Konrád
